name: Space Ninja
description:
You're an astronaut assassin sent to blow the evil robots to smithereens! Careful though, the ceiling is fragile and if it falls down you may run out of space to escape!

WASD to move

Z Places bomb

X Detonated bombs

C Camouflages ninja

Spacebar Interacts

HINT: Too dark? Try ninja vision when you press Camouflage
